bug.summary: Tasks path / Completion path not fully shown if long
bug.description: This is probably trivial to solve, but I don't want to mess with the front-end code too much: When using a long path (as is often the case with ADLS storage), the full path is not displayed any more. Edit: In case it is not obvious (maybe not the best screenshot): The path does not end after "user", it goes on, but this is not shown any more. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16296708/97189937-71219100-17a5-11eb-8666-a18fda26cb35.png></denchmark-link>
